name: Parchis HD8: Ads
description:
iPad's Parchis HD evolves! Now it merges perfectly with your iPhone! Featuring an online game where you can challenge your friends or random players from around the world.

Play against your family and friends or play solo, trying to defeat the machine.

· Challenge your friends or random players in the new Online Mode.
· Play multiple games at once.
· Integrated chat system.
· Play solo against the AI.
· Intuitive interface that fits perfectly with iOS.
· Adapted to all iPhones including the new iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus.
· Integration with Game Center.

*Free versión with ads.
